ygData.subject: Fighter armor and weapons at low level
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I was wondering if some of you could help me.  I got my hubby involved in EQ so he d stop bugging me to get off the computer.  He s got a 10th lvl
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

I was wondering if some of you could help me. I got my hubby involved in EQ
so he'd stop bugging me to get off the computer. He's got a 10th lvl
halfling fighter, and I know next to nothing about the melee classes.
Assuming he's got about 1000pp to spend, what are his best choices for armor
and a decent weapon. He's got a fine steel longsword right now, which seems
to suck, and leather armor. Should he go to bronze or fine steel armor?
What does a full suit of either of these cost? And what's the best weapon
for him at this point?

Also, I'm trying to powerlevel him just a little so we can go adventuring
together, though I'm not generally a fan of leveling people that don't know
what they're doing. They should die plenty and learn like the rest of us
did :P I have a 16 druid and he just needs a couple of levels so we can
hang out. Is there a good place to do this quickly? All I can think of at
the moment is to fear kite lions and bears, oh my, and let him hack them up.
There's so darn many people in EC these days, though.

Thanks for any help!!

Laura
